title: Ethical Hacking
text: This module is designed to introduce the fundamentals of the Internet and its primary concepts, from their origin to the current trending concepts of the information security world.

section.title: Benefits
section.content: Improve your knowledge of risks, vulnerabilities, and operational inefficiencies in systems

section.title: Benefits
section.content: Develop system penetration testing techniques to build your network security skill-set

section.title: Benefits
section.content: Certificate of Participation for each participant from Techkriti, IIT Kanpur
